thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Halcón Resources Announces Public Offering Of Common Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Halcón Resources Announces Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-halcón resources announces public offering of common stock feb

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Halcon Resources Corp:
* HALCÓN RESOURCES ANNOUNCES PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK
* SAYS OFFERING 8.00 MILLION COMMON SHARES * TO USE PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING TO FUND PORTION OF PURCHASE PRICE FOR ACQUISITIONS OF SOUTHERN DELAWARE BASIN ASSETS
* EXPECTS TO GRANT UNDERWRITERS AN OPTION FOR 30 DAYS TO PURCHASE UP TO AN ADDITIONAL 1.2 MILLION SHARES OF COMPANY‘S COMMON STOCK Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
